content: of chain 3 72 double_crochet fasten_off using photos as guides crochet embellishments separately and sew onto beanie circles same as round 1 of beanie use single_crochet for smaller circles on back double_crochet for larger circles on front fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing onto beanie 1 use magic loop or chain space 11st in first chain join with slip_stitch to top of chain 12 st squares with circle center 1 use magic loop or chain 3 11 double_crochet in first chain join with slip_stitch to top of ch3 12 double_crochet 2 chain 3 *3dc in next st double_crochet in next stitch double_crochet in next st* around ending after the first single double_crochet as your ch3 will serve as the final double_crochet fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing onto beanie small black rectangles on back 1 chain 6 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and remaining chains 3dc 2-3 double_crochet in each stitch fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing onto beanie blue and gray rectangle on front 1 with blue chain 8 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and remaining chains 5dc 2-3 double_crochet in each stitch change to gray 4 single_crochet around the edge working 3 single_crochet in each corner change to black 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet working 3 single_crochet in each corner fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing onto beanie gray vertical lines attach gray yarn with slip_stitch chain across blue stripe on beanie slip_stitch to opposite side of blue stripe fasten_off lines over rounds 4-6 should be equidistant and divide the stripe into 6 sections placement of lines over rounds 12-14 are based on photo use this same technique to work a gray line over the middle of the blue and gray rectangle sewn onto the front c3po - gold worsted yarn and scraps of gray 1 use magic loop or chain 3 11 double_crochet in first chain join with slip_stitch to top of ch3 12 double_crochet 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in next st and each st around double_crochet in joining st join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 24 double_crochet 3 chain 3 *double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around double_crochet in joining st join with sl st to top of chain 3 36 double_crochet 4 chain 3 *double_crochet in next 2 st 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around double_crochet in joining st join with sl st to top of chain 3 48 double_crochet 5 chain 3 *double_crochet in next 3 st 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around double_crochet in joining st join with sl st to top of chain 3 60 double_crochet 6 chain 3 double_crochet in next st around 60 double_crochet 7 chain 3 *double_crochet in next 4 st 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around double_crochet in joining st join with sl st to top of chain 3 72 double_crochet 8-15 ch3 double_crochet in each
